forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers between 2pm and 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 77. West wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then scattered showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 1am, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 1am and 3am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 50, with temperatures rising to around 52 overnight. Northwest wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 66. North wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 44. North northwest wind 3 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
